name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

name: Aerial Assault
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavor_text:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

name: Agonizing Syphon
oracle_text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

name: Angelic Gift
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

name: Anvilwrought Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Audacious Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Audacious Thief attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "Skill, imagination, smarts: none of it matters unless you have the nerve to use it."

name: Barony Vampire
flavor_text: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."

name: Bartizan Bats
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: At night, bats will feast on whatever is drawn to lanterns and streetlights.

name: Bastion Enforcer
flavor_text: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the soldiers of Ghirapur are charged with the task of keeping peace in the city.

name: Battalion Foot Soldier
oracle_text: When Battalion Foot Soldier enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Battalion Foot Soldier, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "With me! Break this line and the rest will fall!"

name: Befuddle
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still.

name: Bladebrand
oracle_text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "One knife, two knives, three knives, four—which will drop you to the floor?"

name: Blood Burglar
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Blood Burglar has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Bloodfell Caves
oracle_text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Blossoming Sands
oracle_text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

name: Bogstomper
flavor_text:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
—Vivien Reid

name: Boneclad Necromancer
oracle_text: When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: "Living or dead, everyone responds to the proper motivation."

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"I will make your bones into a weapon that will lay even the mighty low."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Bone to Ash
oracle_text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Boreal Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Spells your opponents cast that target Boreal Elemental cost {2} more to cast.
flavor_text: Winter's breath given form.

name: Brightwood Tracker
oracle_text: {5}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: "Many have walked here, but there is only one trail I seek."

name: Bristling Boar
oracle_text: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: The spikes of bone protruding from its hide serve primarily as protection, but as they accumulate bits of foliage from the surrounding forest, they also provide camouflage.

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Celestial Messenger
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Celestial Messenger gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Yanling planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"It soars on the winds of dreams."
—Mu Yanling

name: Centaur Courser
flavor_text:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
—Ramal, sage of Westgate

name: Chandra's Embercat
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or a Chandra planeswalker spell.
flavor_text:
"Furballs? Try dealing with fireballs."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"There's plenty of fire to go around."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Cloudkin Seer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."

name: Concordia Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: In the cloudy skies and dim light of autumn, a flash of white wings is a reminder that better times lie ahead.

name: Convolute
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text: "Let's see how badly you want what you came for!"

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor_text: The merfolk know every contour of their coral homes; each reef is a garden in times of peace, and a refuge and fortress in times of war.

name: Daggersail Aeronaut
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Daggersail Aeronaut has flying.
flavor_text: "Coming down is the best part!"

name: Dark Remedy
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Writhing tendrils of darkness stitched him back together. Though his will and body both were broken, the necromancer's magic would not let him rest."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Dawning Angel
oracle_text:
Flying
When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"As the sun rose behind the Bone Spire, an angel appeared over the charnel fields, bringing a surge of new hope."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Daybreak Chaplain
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

name: Destructive Digger
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or land: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "I love digging. It gives me lots of time to think about how much I love digging."

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Disentomb
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"If we've run out of warm bodies, then cold bodies will have to do."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Dismal Backwater
oracle_text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Resistance is unthinkable.

name: Engulfing Eruption
oracle_text: Engulfing Eruption deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"Compared to the hunger of the fires within the earth, the appetite of a mere wurm is nothing."
—Phelgis Ojin, Keral Keep acolyte

name: Epicure of Blood
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

name: Faerie Miscreant
oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
flavor_text: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
oracle_text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

name: Fearless Halberdier
flavor_text: "I spent some time in the Legion, but I'm done taking orders all day."

name: Feral Abomination
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"If you manage to get to the heart of the bog, you'll find things there that make zombies seem downright lovable."
—Byaras, backwoods guide

name: Feral Invocation
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

name: Ferocious Pup
oracle_text: When Ferocious Pup enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavor_text: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.

name: Fire Elemental
flavor_text:
"The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Fortress Crab
flavor_text: Unbreakable and unappetizing, the crab grows uninterrupted, sometimes to the size of a cottage and beyond.

name: Frilled Sandwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Even the smallest creatures are fierce in defense of their own territory."
—Vivien Reid

name: Frilled Sea Serpent
oracle_text: {5}{U}{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
—Gertrude, deep-sea angler

name: Frost Lynx
oracle_text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

name: Gift of Paradise
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Glaring Aegis
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Glaring Aegis enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

name: Goblin Assailant
flavor_text: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

name: Goblin Bird-Grabber
oracle_text: {R}: Goblin Bird-Grabber gains flying until end of turn. Activate only if you control a creature with flying.
flavor_text: "I opens my mouth to catches the bugs!"

name: Goblin Smuggler
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Another target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "I am but a humble traveler. I have no taste for sneakery nor thiefiness."

name: Gorging Vulture
oracle_text:
Flying
When Gorging Vulture enters the battlefield, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Greenwood Sentinel
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

name: Griffin Protector
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Here is a companion who will never falter, no matter how desperate the battle!"
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Griffin Sentinel
oracle_text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

name: Growth Cycle
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. It gets an additional +2/+2 until end of turn for each card named Growth Cycle in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Shed your faded husk! Emerge sleeker and stronger!"
—Tyris, fauna shaman

name: Haazda Officer
oracle_text: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"

name: Healer of the Glade
oracle_text: When Healer of the Glade enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Grief and rage and nightmares fade
Where hope and comfort make their stand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 4

name: Heart-Piercer Bow
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, Heart-Piercer Bow deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Hostile Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."

name: Impassioned Orator
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.

name: Imperial Outrider
flavor_text: Her mount's hollow crest can produce a trumpeting warning that carries for miles, summoning more knights to her aid.

name: Infuriate
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"No shirt, no shoes, no service."
—Marketplace sign

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We are armed with light and steel. Who can stand against us?"

name: Inspiring Captain
oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Time to show the foe our true mettle."

name: Ironclad Krovod
flavor_text:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Jungle Hollow
oracle_text:
Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.
When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

name: Keldon Raider
oracle_text: When Keldon Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.

name: Lavakin Brawler
oracle_text: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.
flavor_text: She swings with the ease of flowing lava and hits with the force of a meteor.

name: Leafkin Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control four or more creatures, add {G}{G} instead.
flavor_text: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."

name: Mammoth Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"If a careless elf ends up caught in a spider's web, we must expect nature to take its course. Do not blame the spider for being a spider."
—Dellin Berting, Tolarian entomologist

name: Maniacal Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor_text: Rage is the culmination of an accelerating cycle of anger and violence that feeds itself in battle, spreading like a flame from one warrior to another.

name: Marauder's Axe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: A sharp axe solves most problems.

name: Metropolis Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

name: Moat Piranhas
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text:
"Come on, it's not even that deep!"
—Gorin the Brazen

name: Moment of Heroism
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Moorland Inquisitor
oracle_text: {2}{W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"By fate or by will, every reign must come to an end."
—Kethis, the Hidden Hand

name: Natural End
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

name: Netcaster Spider
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Nimble Birdsticker
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: "What goes up must get stuck."

name: Oakenform
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor_text:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Octoprophet
oracle_text: When Octoprophet enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: In every swirl of the tide, it sees the awakening of things yet to come.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Can't a fella get a moment's peace around here?"

name: Pack Mastiff
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Each creature you control named Pack Mastiff gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Their loyalty is not to any master, but to the pack.

name: Phantom Warrior
oracle_text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"Only when I saw my enemy walk through all my defenses, untouchable as the moon in the sky, did I truly know what it is to be afraid."
—King Ixes

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Even the pterodon, who chases the clouds from its skies, must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

name: Prismite
oracle_text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Even its shadow is a dazzling rainbow.

name: Prized Unicorn
oracle_text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.
flavor_text:
"Friend and foe alike are irresistibly drawn to its beauty—the good, to their lasting reward, and the evil, to their brief and painful regret."
—Vivien Reid

name: Prowling Caracal
flavor_text: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

name: Rabid Bite
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"You should have seen the look on *both* their faces."
—Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper

name: Raise the Alarm
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor_text: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

name: Reckless Air Strike
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Reckless Air Strike deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: "I have a *great* idea!"

name: Reduce to Ashes
oracle_text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
"Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire."
—Harra the Adjudicator

name: Ripscale Predator
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: Dinosaurs rarely understand the idea of boundaries between the wild and the urban landscape.

name: Rubblebelt Recluse
oracle_text: Rubblebelt Recluse attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.

name: Rugged Highlands
oracle_text:
Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Sage's Row Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
flavor_text: "Forget what you have learned from other teachers. I bring you the truth."

name: Sanitarium Skeleton
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His mind was lost long before his flesh.

name: Savage Gorger
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."

name: Savannah Sage
oracle_text: When Savannah Sage enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Now is not the time for your light to fade."

name: Scorch Spitter
oracle_text: Whenever Scorch Spitter attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
flavor_text:
"Yes, she can be a nuisance. But at least my tea never gets cold."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

name: Scoured Barrens
oracle_text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

name: Sedge Scorpion
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "I love this thing! It's my best invention since the boulderfist gauntlet!"

name: Show of Valor
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"As the knight struggled to stand, his squire took up his blade. The foe advanced not a single step."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Siege Mastodon
flavor_text:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

name: Silverback Shaman
oracle_text:
Trample
When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Skeleton Archer
oracle_text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Sleep Paralysis
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Sleep doesn't always mean rest.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

name: Sorcerer of the Fang
oracle_text: {5}{B}, {T}: Sorcerer of the Fang deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "The Great Serpent slumbers now, but all warmbloods will grovel in the dirt at its awakening!"

name: Sorin's Thirst
oracle_text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

name: Soulmender
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

name: Soul Salvage
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

name: Squad Captain
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.
flavor_text: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Steadfast Sentry
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Steadfast Sentry dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: "Get up, slugabeds! We've got company, and they're not dressed for a party!"

name: Stone Golem
flavor_text: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul into his work. But the newly awakened golem decided it wanted its creator's other, more tangible parts.

name: Swiftwater Cliffs
oracle_text:
Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped.
When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

name: Take Vengeance
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

name: Tectonic Rift
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!"
—Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord

name: Thicket Crasher
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Other Elementals you control have trample.
flavor_text:
"Tread too hard in the forest and it will tread on you in return."
—Vivien Reid

name: Thornwood Falls
oracle_text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Tranquil Cove
oracle_text:
Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

name: Trusted Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

name: Undead Servant
oracle_text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"There are always more like you."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Unholy Indenture
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"Don't think of it as selling your soul. It's more like you're bequeathing it to me."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Don't you have somewhere else to be?"
—Sharuum the Hegemon

name: Vampire Opportunist
oracle_text: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "I think I cracked a fang."

name: Vial of Dragonfire
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Vial of Dragonfire: It deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"The artificer assured me that the vial is strong enough to contain the dragon's breath. I just need to make sure to throw it far enough."
—Kunh Mei, last words

name: Vivien's Crocodile
oracle_text: Vivien's Crocodile gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Vivien planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Regardless of where they come from, crocs are usually able to find their way home. For this one, home is me."
—Vivien Reid

name: Vorstclaw
flavor_text: Roots reach deep, and sometimes they tap into things better left undisturbed.

name: Walking Corpse
flavor_text:
"What does it mean when the dead feed on the dead? When no new life emerges, but only more death? Is it not an endless spiral into annihilation?"
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

name: Wildfire Elemental
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Fire is always dancing, leaping and whirling, seeking more fuel. It never rests, so why should I?"
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
oracle_text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Winged Words
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Magic written across the sky falls like rain on thirsty ground, bringing forth wisdom in its season.

name: Wolfkin Bond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Woodland Mystic
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "I sing to the branches, and they reach to the sky. I sing to the leaves, and they open to the sun. I sing to the roots, and they dig their fingers deep. I sing the song that creation sung."

name: Yoked Ox
flavor_text: The courage of those who work the land is born of long days of labor in the hot summer sun and the cold winter wind. It is the courage of the earth itself.

name: Zephyr Charge
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The knights charged forward on wings of wind, and the necromancer's horde roared in helpless rage."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*
